title: Tofuberry
instructions: Place tofu, soy milk, yogurt, raspberries, banana, and orange juice in a blender. Blend until smooth. Pour in glasses over ice or vanilla ice cream.

title: Avocado Banana Nut
instructions: Blend almond milk, avocado, banana, peanut butter, and vanilla extract in a blender until smooth.

title: Papaya Passion
ingredients: 1 cup frozen papaya - peeled, seeded and cubed
instructions: Place papaya, almond milk, agave, condensed milk, and frozen banana in a blender. Blend until smooth. Serve immediately.

title: Cucumber Pear
instructions: Layer cucumber, pear, pineapple, white beans, parsley, and ginger in a blender; add water. Cover and blend mixture until smooth, adding more water for a thinner smoothie.

title: PB&J
instructions: Blend strawberries, milk, peanut butter, and oats together in a blender until smooth.

title: Matcha-Berry Swirl
instructions:
Combine spinach, 1 cup orange juice, peaches, pineapple, 1 halved banana, and green tea powder in a blender; blend until combined. Pour smoothie into a glass.
Rinse out the blender.
Combine 1 cup orange juice, raspberries, strawberries, and 1 halved banana in the blender; blend until combined. Pour berry smoothie into a separate glass.
Combine smoothies by pouring them at the same time from opposite sides of the serving glass.

title: Any Way You Want It Kale
instructions: Blend kale, yogurt, and peanuts together in a blender until smooth. Add milk, banana, strawberries, and maple syrup and blend until desired consistency is reached.

title: New Year Detox Green
instructions: Combine coconut water, green tea, banana, spinach, protein powder, and mint in a blender; blend until smooth, 1 to 2 minutes.

title: Blueberry Mango
instructions: Grind chia seeds in a food processor until pulverized; add yogurt, mango juice, blueberries, mango, and vanilla extract and blend until smooth.

title: Quick Kale and Banana Smoothie
ingredients: 1/2 cup frozen strawberries, or more to taste
instructions: Blend kale, banana, coconut milk, and strawberries together in a blender until smooth.

title: Paleo Apple Pie
ingredients: 1/4 teaspoon ground cinnamon, or as desired
instructions: Layer apple, pineapple, cashew butter, coconut, flax meal, vanilla extract, and cinnamon into a blender; add almond milk. Blend mixture until smooth.

title: Mango Pineapple Green Smoothie
instructions: Place pineapple, mango, banana, spinach, and orange juice, respectively, in a blender and blend until smooth.

title: Perfect Peach Smoothie
ingredients: 1 banana, cut into pieces and frozen
instructions: Blend peach, banana, orange juice, soy milk, and flax seed in a blender until smooth.

title: Chocolate Peanut Banana Smoothie
instructions: Blend almond milk, banana, peanut butter, and cocoa powder together in a blender until smooth.

title: The Boss!
instructions: Pour milk into a blender; add peaches, banana, and yogurt. Blend mixture until smooth.

title: Morning Smoothie
instructions: Layer banana, spinach, mixed fruit, flax meal, protein powder, chia seeds, and matcha powder in a blender in the order listed; add enough water to cover. Cover blender and blend until smooth.

title: Blueberry Vanilla Graham Protein Smoothie
instructions: Combine coconut water, banana, blueberries, kale, spinach, dates, almond butter, hemp seed hearts, flax seeds, oats, and protein powder in a blender. Cover and puree until smooth. Top with graham cracker crumbs.

title: Moring Coconut Smoothie
instructions: Layer bananas, peaches, coconut milk, moringa powder, and almond butter in a blender; add water. Blend mixture until very smooth, at least 1 minute.

title: Uncle Monkey Smoothie
instructions: Blend bananas, peanut butter, milk, and cacao, together in a blender until smooth.

title: Green Tea Pear Smoothie
instructions: Mix almond milk and protein powder together in a cup; pour into a blender. Add spinach, pear, cashews, and green tea powder; blend until smooth.

title: Elvis Smoothie (Almond and Banana)
instructions:
Place banana chunks into a sealable plastic bag and freeze until solid, 1 to 2 hours to overnight.
Place frozen bananas into a blender with skim milk, almond butter, and vanilla extract; ,blend until smooth. Pour into a large glass and garnish with a pinch of ground cinnamon to serve.

title: Zucchini and Carrot Smoothie
instructions: Blend zucchini, carrot, yogurt, milk, oats, honey, and flax seeds in a blender until smooth.

title: Lean Green Smoothie
instructions: Place the honeydew melon, ice cubes, grapes, cucumber, broccoli, and mint into a blender. Cover, and puree until smooth.

title: Skinny Black Forest Smoothie
ingredients: 1 teaspoon chia seeds, or to taste (optional)
instructions: Place baby spinach, cherries, almond milk, rolled oats, cocoa powder, and sweetener in a blender. Blend until smooth, about 2 minutes. Pour into a glass and top with chia seeds.

title: Nectarine Sunshine Smoothie
instructions: Place the nectarines, frozen banana chunks, orange, orange juice, and agave into a blender, and blend until smooth.

title: Carrot Cake Smoothie
instructions: Pulse carrot and mango together in a blender until roughly chopped. Add peach, soy milk, cinnamon, allspice, and ginger; blend until smooth.

title: Good-To-Go Morning Smoothie
instructions: Blend spinach, oats, apple juice, banana, and peanut butter together in a blender or food processor until smooth.

title: Jumping Ginger Smoothie
ingredients: 1 leaf kale leaf, or more to taste
1 (1 inch) piece fresh ginger root, or more to taste
instructions: Blend water, avocado, parsley, apple, carrot, lemon, kale, ginger, ice cubes, and flax seeds in a blender on high until smooth, 10 to 15 seconds.

title: Purple Monstrosity Fruit Smoothie
instructions: Place bananas, blueberries and juice in a blender, puree. Use honey and/or vanilla to taste. Use more or less liquid depending on the thickness you want for your smoothie.

title: Carrot Mango
ingredients: 1 large ripe mango, peeled, pitted and chopped
instructions: Combine the orange juice, carrot juice, ice, banana and mango in a blender and blend until smooth. Pour into 2 glasses and serve.;

title: Almond Milk and Berry Smoothie
ingredients: 1/2 medium banana, peeled and cut into chunks
2 cups chilled unsweetened vanilla-flavored almond milk
instructions:
Watch how to make this recipe.
In a blender, add the banana chunks, blueberries, strawberries, and mango. Blend until combined, about 30 seconds. Serve in chilled glasses with straws.

title: Mango Pineapple Strawberry Smoothie
ingredients: 2 scoops coconut sorbet or strawberry sorbet
instructions: In a blender process the mango, pineapple juice, strawberries and coconut sorbet until smooth. Serve in a tall glass and garnish with strawberry.

title: Big Berry Smoothie
instructions: Add all the ingredients to a blender and pulse until smooth.

title: Green Morning Smoothie
instructions:
Watch how to make this recipe.
Place the milk and oats in a blender and blend for 15 seconds on high. Add the peaches, ice, spinach, honey, vanilla and bananas and blend until very smooth, 45 seconds. Serve in glasses.

title: Banana Orange Smoothie
instructions: Pour ingredients into a blender and blend until smooth.;

title: Katie's Kale Smoothie
instructions:
Watch how to make this recipe.
Combine the kale, grapes, orange juice, pear, banana and 1/2 cup water in a blender with ice and blend until smooth.

title: Tropical Smoothie
instructions:
Watch how to make this recipe.
In a blender, combine the mango, papaya, banana, orange juice, milk, yogurt, honey, and ice. Blend until smooth.

title: Blueberry Smoothie
ingredients: 1 frozen peeled banana, cut into 2-inch chunks
instructions:
Special equipment: a high-powered blender, optional
In a carafe of a high-powered blender, combine the avocado, banana, blueberries, coconut water, collard greens, pineapple, lime juice and ,ginger. Blend until thick and creamy.

title: Banana-Coconut Pudding Smoothie
ingredients: 1/2 teaspoon ground cinnamon, plus more for sprinkling
instructions: Combine the banana, coconut, date, cinnamon, nutmeg and coconut water in a blender and puree until smooth, adding more liquid if necessary. Pour into a glass and sprinkle with cinnamon.

title: It's Elvis, Baby! Smoothie
ingredients: 1 teaspoon protein powder or other powdered vitamin supplement, optional
instructions: In a blender, combine all the ingredients. Blend for about 1 minute. Pour into a large glass and serve.

title: Lowfat Green Tea, Honey and Nutmeg Smoothies
ingredients: 1 tablespoon honey, plus more for garnish
instructions: Place all ingredients in a blender and puree until smooth. Pour into individual glasses and drizzle honey on top of each milkshake to finish.

title: Ultra-Creamy Avocado Smoothie
instructions: Blend the milk, sweetened condensed milk and ice in a blender until very smooth. Add the avocado flesh and blend again until smooth. The mixture will be quite thick; add cold water a few tablespoons at a time, blending after each addition, until the mixture is pourable. Taste and add more sweetened condensed milk if you want it sweeter. Serve in chilled glasses with straws.

title: Melon Smoothies
ingredients: 1 1/2 cups seeded and chopped honeydew melon
instructions: Place all ingredients in a blender and blend until smooth. Pour into glasses.

title: Complete Breakfast Smoothie
instructions:
Watch how to make this recipe.
Add the milk, coffee, peanut butter, coconut oil, honey, vanilla and bananas to a blender and puree until smooth. Serve immediately.

title: Green Smoothie
ingredients: 1 cup chopped fresh pineapple, plus a pineapple wedge for garnish
instructions: Put the pineapple, kale, frozen grapes, lemon juice, ginger and flaxseed into a blender. Blend on high until very smooth, turning off the blender and pushing down on the ingredients with a spatula or wooden spoon as needed to help the blending process. Add 1 to 2 tablespoons of water if needed to adjust consistency. Pour into a glass and garnish with a pineapple wedge.

title: Power Smoothie
ingredients: 2 tablespoons powdered peanut butter, such as PB2
instructions: Combine the almond milk, kale, powdered peanut butter, protein powder, banana and ice in a blender and blend until smooth. Serve immediately.

title: Strawberry and Farm Fresh Blueberry Smoothie
instructions:
Watch how to make this recipe.
Special equipment: a plastic straw and two 16-ounce (or four 8-ounce) Mason jars, optional
Using the plastic straw, remove the white bitter interior and stem of each strawberry. You do this by centering the straw on the bottom pointed end of the fruit, pushing up through the inside to the top and popping off the stem in one smooth motion. Staying centered on the fruit with the straw is the key to quickly hulling and removing the bitter core of strawberries. (You can alternatively cut the stems and white bitter flesh out with a knife.)
In a blender, combine the strawberries, blueberries, coconut water and strawberry yogurt and cover with the lid. Press the setting for puree and let it run until the texture is nice and smooth, at least 30 seconds.
Pour into two 16-ounce Mason jars (or glasses), or four 8-ounce jars. Garnish with granola and mint leaves.

title: Blueberry Power Smoothie
instructions: Place everything in a blender and puree until smooth.

title: Gluten-Free Coconut Pineapple Strawberry Smoothies
ingredients: 1 cup fresh or canned pineapple chunks
instructions:
Watch how to make this recipe.
Pour the coconut milk into a clean ice cube tray (it will not fill the entire tray) and freeze at least 4 hours or up to overnight. Add the coconut milk cubes, strawberries, pineapples, pineapple juice and flax seeds to a blender and puree until smooth. Pour into glasses and serve.

title: Mean Green Smoothie
ingredients: 1 medium ripe kiwi, peeled and chopped
1/2 Granny Smith apple, cored and chopped
instructions: Add the spinach, grapes, tea, kiwi, mint and apples to the bowl of a blender. Blend until smooth, adding water if needed to get the desired consistency. Drink with a straw.

title: Blueberry Pomegranate Smoothie
instructions: Place the pomegranate juice, blueberries, yogurt, honey and ice in a blender. Turn on high and blend until smooth. Serve in a reusable to-go cup.;

title: Pineapple Mama Smoothie
ingredients: 1/2 cup kefir (cultured milk product available in specialty health food stores)
instructions: Add the ice to the blender pitcher. Combine the Kefir, pineapple, and honey in a bowl and then add to the blender. Blend until smooth. Pour into glasses and serve.

title: Pina Colada Smoothie
instructions: In a blender, combine the pineapple chunks, coconut milk, banana, ice and, if desired, honey. Puree until smooth. Pour into 2 large glasses. Garnish each serving with a pineapple wedge.

title: Peanut Butter and Jelly Smoothie
ingredients: 2 tablespoons protein powder, strawberry or vanilla flavor
instructions: In a small blender, add (in this order) the peanut butter, jam, protein powder, ice and almond milk. Blend until thick and smooth. Serve immediately.

title: Honeydew-Almond Smoothie
instructions: Blend 2 cups chopped honeydew melon, 1 cup each almond milk and ice, and honey.

title: Purple Smoothie Pops
ingredients: 2 cups frozen mixed berries (or frozen strawberries)
1 cup cranberry or grape juice (or any deep red/purple juice)
instructions:
Watch how to make this recipe.
Special equipment: ice-pop molds
Add the yogurt, frozen berries, honey, banana and cabbage to a blender. Then pour in the juice and blend until smooth!
Pour ,into ice-pop molds and stash them in the freezer until totally frozen. Remove and eat as required!

title: Apple and Cinnamon Breakfast Smoothie
instructions: Combine the milk, oats, yogurt, apple, cinnamon and 3 ice cubes in a blender, and blend until smooth and creamy, about 1 minute.

title: Honeydew Smoothie
ingredients: 2 tablespoons apple juice, from frozen concentrate
instructions:
In a blender, combine melon, yogurt, and apple juice concentrate. Blend until smooth. With blender running, add ice until frothy.
Pour into 2 (16-ounce) glasses and garnish with sliced ,melon.

title: Strawberry Banana Smoothie
ingredients: Fusion Boosters (ginseng, bee pollen, multivitimin, ginko biloba, lecithin, and/or soy protein)
instructions: Blend 15 to 20 seconds, use a spatula to remove the thick and creamy smoothie from the blender.

title: Coconut Water
instructions:
Fill ice trays with the coconut water and freeze until solid.
Place the fruit, honey and 12 to 14 coconut water-flavored ice cubes into a blender and blend until smooth. Serve immediately.
